Does *NOT* work on PS3. Blocked by Cinavia protection after only about 5 minutes of play. This is a full stop and complete block, not just audio turning off, the playback halts.

This was after de-muxing and re-muxing the file into a .mpg so it would play on ps3. First had to use mkvToolnix to rebuild the .mkv file (no change to the inner content streams) because the container is corrupted and causes mkv2vob to crash.

After converting the .mkv to a valid .mkv with mkvToolnix, then used the new .mkv in mkv2vob and processed it into a .mpg (keeping it as H264 and AC3 audio).

Playback looks great and sounds good, but dies after 5 minutes due to Cinavia protection. Aarrrghhhhh!!!!!
